ngrid.name: names
ngrid.documentation: The full name(s) of the data variable(s) in a comma-seperated list.

ngrid.name: variableNames
ngrid.documentation: The shortened name(s) of the data variable(s) in a comma-seperated list. Must be valid MATLAB variable names.

ngrid.name: ontologyNodes
ngrid.documentation: The ontology node id(s) of the data variable (s) in a comma-seperated list.

ngrid.name: data
ngrid.documentation: A structure with variableNames as fields and arrays of corresponding data as values.
